places.name: Arequipa Main Square
places.description: The heart of the city, surrounded by impressive ashlar stone buildings and the cathedral.

places.name: Santa Catalina Monastery
places.description: A monastery that resembles a small city with streets and squares, founded in 1579.

places.name: Misti Volcano
places.description: The iconic volcano of Arequipa, standing at 5,822 meters above sea level.

places.name: Colca Canyon
places.description: One of the world's deepest canyons, famous for condor flights.

places.name: Founder's Mansion
places.description: A house museum showcasing colonial era architecture and lifestyle.

places.name: Arequipa Cathedral
places.description: One of the most important cathedrals in Peru, built with white ashlar stone.

places.name: Andean Sanctuaries Museum
places.description: Home to the mummy Juanita, a young Inca girl sacrificed on the Ampato volcano.

places.name: Yanahuara Viewpoint
places.description: Famous for its ashlar stone arches and panoramic view of the city and Misti Volcano.
